about.title: About Outliers Academy
about.description: We are a company specialized in design, software development and artificial intelligence. We design your brand, grow your online presence, increase your sales and optimize your processes with software and artificial intelligence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Transform businesses through technological innovation, combining exceptional design with cutting-edge software development and artificial intelligence to create solutions that generate real and lasting impact.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading company in comprehensive technological solutions, recognized for our ability to innovate and for helping companies reach their maximum potential through digital transformation and artificial intelligence.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the professionals who make your business digital transformation possible.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our courses, platform, and services.

general.title: General Questions
general.description: Basic information about our courses and platform

enrollment.question: How can I enroll in a course?
enrollment.answer: You can enroll directly from each course page. You just need to create an account and proceed with payment through our secure system.

certificate.question: Do courses include a certificate?
certificate.answer: Yes, all our courses include a completion certificate that you can download once you have completed all the content and exercises.

devices.question: Can I access content from any device?
devices.answer: Absolutely. Our platform is optimized to work on computers, tablets and mobile devices, so you can learn from wherever you want.

support.question: Is technical support available?
support.answer: Yes, we have a technical support team available to help you with any technical issues you may experience on the platform.

platform.question: What browsers are supported?
platform.answer: Our platform works best with Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. We recommend using the latest version of your browser.

browser.question: Can I use the platform offline?
browser.answer: Currently, our platform requires an internet connection to access course content and track your progress.

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.description: Payment methods, refunds, and billing questions

expiration.question: Do courses have an expiration date?
expiration.answer: No, once you purchase a course, you have lifetime access to the content, including future updates.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with your course, you can request a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our payment partners.

cta.title: Can't find what you're looking for?
cta.description: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues you may have.

cookies.title: We use cookies to enhance your experience
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide, protect, and improve our services and to personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.

preferences.title: Cookie Preferences
preferences.description: Customize your cookie preferences. You can change these settings at any time.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Enable the website to remember information that changes how it behaves or looks, like your preferred language or region.
